title: TCS Standalone December 2025 Net Sales at Rs 55,567.00 crore, up 3.13% Y-o-Y
author: Broker Research
content:
Reported Standalone quarterly numbers for Tata Consultancy Services are:Net Sales at Rs 55,567.00 crore in December 2025 up 3.13% from Rs. 53,883.00 crore in December 2024. Quarterly Net Profit at Rs. 10,190.00 crore in December 2025 down 13.88% from Rs. 11,832.00 crore in December 2024. EBITDA stands at Rs. 17,743.00 crore in December 2025 up 5.33% from Rs. 16,845.00 crore in December 2024. TCS EPS has decreased to Rs. 28.16 in December 2025 from Rs. 32.71 in December 2024. TCS shares closed at 3,239.60 on January 09, 2026 (NSE) and has given 0.52% returns over the last 6 months and -24.50% over the last 12 months.
